title: Blue Collar Skins
body:
Me and a couple of co-workers that also play were discussing what champs would look like out on site.
and we came up with some ideas, now as you are not allowed on site without certain items a hard hat (which come in many colours now days), yellow or oranges long sleeve shirt with silver stripes, oversized boots and gloves, and long blue pants.
some we came up with are:
1. {{champion:42}} Road paver, dropping molten asphalt and firing bitumen
2. {{champion:122}} Ditch Digger , Shovel of doooooom
3. {{champion:105}} Jackhammer, Jackhammer sound effect on bounce
4. {{champion:40}} Traffic Controller, switches to stop when using  zephyr and eye of the storm and go when using howling gale and monsoon. 
5. {{champion:24}}  Traffic Controller, Red and Green swirl as he dodges.
6. {{champion:236}} Carpenter, With duel Nail guns.
7. {{champion:75}}  A Miner, With the little light on the helmet and a pickaxe.
8. {{champion:412}} Crane Operator, With the hook and coiled cable.
9. {{champion:48}} Demolition Sledge, hammer and his ult is a building that explodes at the end.
10. {{champion:15}} Demosaw, There is something sexy about about a girl working heavy machinery.
